docna.cdata!:
Bangladesh - Thirteenth Import Program :
            Credit 1655 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Bangladesh - Thirteenth Import
            Program : Credit 1655 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

repnme.cdata!:
Bangladesh - Thirteenth Imports Program
            Credit Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Thirteenth Imports Program Credit
            Project will provide foreign exchange to finance general
            imports. In order to reduce Bangladesh's dependence on
            concessional aid inflows, the Government has agreed, in the
            context of negotiations for the proposed credit, to
            undertake policy and administrative improvements designed to
            increase efficiency in agricultural and food programs, and
            its capacity for economic management.
